pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, May 28, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, will participate in a virtual conversation with families to discuss the Canada Child Benefit. The event is being organized by Moms at Work, a community for working moms across Canada.

The conversation will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Media Appearances

4:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on OMNI News Italian Edition.

8:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Ora Qui, on CHIN TV.

8:45 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TLN TV.
